text: The High Druid of Albion has returned from his journey to Beast Peaks and brings grave visions of impending doom. A prophecy the Murder-Queen knows all too well, with her timely arrival to ward off the Chaos Invasion. Between them, one must lead our defences and the other be the overseer in the restoration of the Waystones.
Dural Durak shall lead our forces

The Murder-Queen will strike fear into our enemies hearts with her magic, but atop her raven must prove elusive and keep away from danger. The most wise Durak can see to the Waystones tumultuous repair.

Durak shores up his warriors resolve in battle through magic and tactics though he is vulnerable in extended combat he can prove quite deadly atop his chariot. Mhorrin√≠on's unmatched affinity with magic is best suited to the restoration of the Waystones.
